This directory contains an adaption of David Malcolm's library for parsing GCC
command line invocations. We have extended this code to add support for clang
invocations and the additional flags that clang permits.

Author: David Malcolm <dmalcolm@redhat.com>
License: LGPLv2.1+
Upstream: https://github.com/fedora-static-analysis/gccinvocation
Based on git commit: 5e30a50959534d5ad3530747707f6822b44f40fc
